title: Jan Solberg
text:
Jan Solberg (born 3 March 1951) is a Norwegian civil servant.
A <a href="cand.polit.">cand.polit.</a> by education, he worked in the <a href="Norwegian%20Ministry%20of%20Finance">Ministry of Finance</a> from 1979 to 1990. From 1990 to 1995 he served as director of the <a href="Norwegian%20Customs%20and%20Excise%20Authorities">Norwegian Customs and Excise Authorities</a>. From 1995 to 1999 he was the chief executive officer of <a href="Postbanken">Postbanken</a>. He returned to the public sector in 1999 to work as permanent under-secretary of State in the <a href="Norwegian%20Ministry%20of%20Trade%20and%20Industry">Ministry of Trade and Industry</a>. In 2005 he was hired as vice executive of <a href="SINTEF">SINTEF</a>.
